BrowserCMS

BrowserCMS is a general purpose, open source Web Content Management System (CMS), written in Ruby on Rails. This is the API documentation for v3.1.0.

Getting Started (Short Version)

The following requires SQLite3 and Rails 2.3.2 (or later). 

    gem install browsercms

    browsercms project_name -m demo
    cd project_name
    script/server

    Go to http://localhost:3000/cms and log in as cmsadmin/cmsadmin.

Getting Started (Long Version)

See the Getting Started guide (browsercms.org/doc/guides/html/getting_started.html) for how to install and start a BrowserCMS project.
